page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT 2
page.content: ARGYLL HOUSE IS A SHOE SHOP AND CUNNINGHAMS IS A NEWSAGENT.THERE ARE A FEW MORE SMALL SHOPS THAN THESE,WHICH IS QUITE A LOT FOR SUCH A SMALL PLACE. BELOW IS A LIST OF JOBS AT WHICH CHILDRENS FATHERS AND MOTHERS WORK IN BRORA. MOTHERS-HOMEHELPS 14, SHOPS 11, WAITRESSES 2, CLEANERS 1, HAIRDRESSERS 3. FATHERS-DISTILLERY 1, NAVY 1, RADIO STATION 2, FISHING 21, HIGHLAND FABRICATORS 2, FARMING 5. A VAST AMOUNT OF BRORA IS COVERED BY FARMLAND. THERE ARE MORE SHEEP THAN COWS BECAUSE THE GRASS IS ROUGH AND COARSE. THE LAND IS ALSO VERY HILLY.A LOT OF HAY , CORN , AND VEGETABLES ARE GROWN.MANY HORSES ARE KEPT , BUT NOT FOR FARMING. MANY PEOPLE WORK AS HOMEHELPS. A HOMEHELPER DOES DOMESTIC WORK FOR ELDERLY PEOPLE WHO CANNOT DO IT THEMSELVES.
